synopsis.text: In a fantasy world of beasts and heroes, a war rages between humanity and giant creatures called Kyojuu that once created the land. Seeking profit, humans hunt the Kyojuu, using their body parts as weapons gifted by the gods. Jiiro is a seasoned Kyojuu hunter who rescues a mysterious girl named Kuumi from pursuers. As they travel together with Kuumiâ€™s friend Myaa, they discover Kuumi has escaped from a research facility experimenting on magical powers called kannagi. Top officials secretly maneuver as the group wanders the lands, stumbling on rumors of the experiment. Through their adventures, Jiiro and Kuumi uncover secrets about the true enemy humanity faces - themselves. Will they solve the mysteries in time or fall prey to monsters and men alike? Filled with action and intrigue, this anime promises insights on myths, beasts, and the darkness that lies within.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
